net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_healDamage
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip: Heal damage on a token with these parameters in JSON: { "id": Id of the token taking damage, "current": Token's current hit points, "maximum": Token's maximum hit points "healing": The amount of healing applied to the token } Current hit points are healed up to maximum. These token properties must be set: TempHP, DSPass, DSFail. The Exhaustion 6 state should also be set. After applying the healing this macro calls dnd5e_applyHealth
